name: stellar-spa
description: StellarSPA is a pure JavaScript-based Single Page Web Application (SPA) (no external dependencies) designed to be lightweight, fast, and easy to understand.

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy:all
scripts.build:js: npx esbuild app/*.js views/**/*.js routes/*.js services/*.js utils/*.js --outdir=dist --minify --bundle=false
scripts.copy:all: npx cpx "assets/**/*" dist/assets && npx cpx "config/**/*" dist/config && npx cpx "index.html" dist

author: Fitri HY
